Easiest to reach by car but can also be accessed by bus from Motala or by boat on the Göta Canal
Its small - walk and enjoy the town

value: The manually operated locks on the Göta Canal at the entrance to town
content=You can find the Bikerental att the Hi-Hostel"
Take a boat on the Göta Canal - Boats run daily through the summer both to Motala or in the other direction.  One way to Motala from 250 SEK

Delicious but reasonably expensive food served in the Gota hotel(425 SEK for a 3 course menu).  Otherwise there are take away pizza and hamburger restaurants in the town.

value: content=A nice little hotel directly on the Göta Canal in a classic old building. Double rooms without showers for 850 SEK.

content=Between Göta Canal and the river "Motala Ström" you'll find a fine accomodation i a former glasfactory. accomodation i appartments with own kitchen and bathroom and "hostel"accomodation with shared showers in servicebuilding and2 shared kitchens.
